properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 6:28AM PST until January 11 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Northern Lake County, including Alkali Lake, Fort
Rock, Christmas Valley, Highway 395 north of Abert Lake,
Highway 31 between Summer Lake and Silver Lake, and Highway 20.

* WHEN...From 7 AM to 4 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow is expected during this time,
and combined with the wind, may result in periods of
significantly reduced visibility due to blowing and drifting
snow.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON
